pantywaist noun [C]
(PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal disapproving a person, especially a man, who is thought of as weak or cowardly (= not brave): Stop spoiling him or you'll turn him into a pantywaist. The mission was directed by some pantywaist colonel with fancy ideas. Synonym
sissy
More examplesFewer examplesMost of the guys I hang out with want to know why he's being such a pantywaist about this.

pantywaist noun [C]
(CLOTHING)
old-fashioned a piece of clothing that small children wore in the past, consisting of underwear that connects to the bottom of a shirt with buttons : Little girls had to wear a panty-waist and bloomers, and in winter a petticoat. The advantage of a pantywaist is that it provides a support on which to fasten the rest of the clothes.
